# Markdown standards

- All file must pass `markdownlint`; use project rules written in `.markdownlint.json` when present, otherwise the default [markdown rules][markdown-rules] apply.
- Keep a blank line around headings.
- Use reference-style links; place definitions at the bottom.


[markdown-rules]: https://github.com/DavidAnson/markdownlint/blob/main/doc/Rules.md
